CustomField.description: The 1987 version of a 4-digit numeric coding system developed by the US Government for the classification of industrial activities to denote the industry in which the entity does most of its business.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The 1987 version of a 4-digit numeric coding system developed by the US Government for the classification of industrial activities to denote the industry in which the entity does most of its business.
CustomField.label: SIC4 Code 1
